Title: Remnants of Anger
Description: As you look upon the severed claw of the defeated Sha of Anger, you realize that Ban Bearheart, commander of the Shado-Pan in Townlong Steppes, would want to know of your victory.
ObjectivesText: Deliver the Claw of Anger to Ban Bearheart at the Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.
CompletionText:
<Ban looks at you with narrowed eyes.>

Something about you is... different. Changed.
RewardText:
<As you present the Claw to Ban, his eyes grow wide with the realization of what you have done.>

I see now what about you has changed.

You have done the impossible. The Shado-Pan shall record your name, and honor it as long as we stand watch over this land.
